quotes: It takes half your life before you discover life is a do-it-yourself project.
Knowing is not enough, we must apply. Willing is not enough, we must do.
Trust is the foundation of great leadership.
The only people without problems are those in cemeteries.
If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.
No one has ever become poor by giving.
Many roads lead to the path, but basically there are only two: reason and practice.
The most important thing is to enjoy your life, to be happy, it's all that matters.
Decide what your truth is. Then live it.
When you want something in life, you just gotta reach out and grab it.
The attempt to escape from pain, is what creates more pain.
Presents are made for the pleasure of who gives them, not the merits of who receives them.
A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
To share your weakness is to make yourself vulnerable; to make yourself vulnerable is to show your strength.
The majority of what you want will come from the minority of what you do.
Don't put off living to next week, next month, next year or next decade. The only time you're ever living is in this moment.
Grudges are for those who insist that they are owed something; forgiveness, however, is for those who are substantial enough to move on.
It's beautiful to be alone. To be alone does not mean to be lonely. It means the mind is not influenced and contaminated by society.
Do all things with love.
Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
Not all those who wander are lost.
What you become is far more important than what you get.
The universe doesn't give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.
Know yourself and you will win all battles.
Always seek out the seed of triumph in every adversity.
We learn by pushing ourselves and finding what really lies at the outer reaches of our abilities.
Reading should be a pleasure, not a chore.
The more often a stupidity is repeated, the more it gets the appearance of wisdom.
Life is a question and how we live it is our answer.
Judge your success by what you had to give up in order to get it.
You already have every characteristic necessary for success if you recognize, claim, develop and use them.
Be royal in your own fashion: act like a king to be treated like one.
You can, you should, and if you're brave enough to start, you will.
How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
You are what you do, not what you say you'll do.
It is useless to meet revenge with revenge; it will heal nothing.
No one returns from a long journey the same person they were before.
If you want work well done, select a busy man; the other kind has no time.
Love yourself with the same intensity you would use to pull yourself up if you were hanging off a cliff.
I have never in my life learned anything from any man who agreed with me.
To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
Never put off to tomorrow what you can do to-day.
Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
The consequences of today are determined by the actions of the past. To change your future, alter your decisions today.
Bloom where you are planted!
Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be.
Dance first. Think later. It's the natural order.
It is easier to fight for one's principles than to live up to them.
A clear conscience never fears midnight knocking.
